title: HUGE 4 BEDROOM LUXURY DUPLEX
posting_body: ['Renovated 8 room duplex with private garden.', 'This apartment features 1 and a half marble bathrooms, granite kitchen, with stainless steel appliances such as a dishwasher and wine cooler, washer & dryer in apartment, and hardwood floors.', 'Perfect for entertaining.', 'This residence features:', '• Granite Counter-tops', '•Stainless Steel Appliances with Dishwasher', '-Wine Cooler', '•Marble bathroom', '•In-unit washer/dryer', '•Ample closet space', '•Hardwood floors', '•Exposed brick.', '-High Ceilings', 'Located in the East Village near St Marks Place and directly across from Tompkins Square Park!.', 'Steps from great nightlife, bars, and restaurants.', 'Located along M15 SelectBus service, and a short walk to the 6, N, and R trains..', 'APARTMENT FEATURES', 'Washer / Dryer', 'Duplex', 'High Ceilings', 'Exposed Bricks', 'KITCHEN', 'Dishwasher', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Microwave', 'Countertops [Granite]', 'BATHROOM', 'Half Bath', 'Marble', 'OUTDOOR SPACE', 'Balcony', 'Garden', 'BUILDING DESCRIPTION', 'Pre-war', 'Built 1900', 'Low-rise', '5 Floors', '13 Apartments', 'Walk-Up', 'Voice Intercom', 'BUILDING AMENITIES', 'Courtyard', 'Laundry Room', 'BUILDING POLICIES', 'Sublets Allowed.', 'Income Required: 40x Rent', 'Guarantors Allowed', 'Guarantors Income Required: 60x Rent', 'Corporate Guarantors Allowed', 'Insurent Allowed', 'TheGuarantors Allowed', 'Corporate Leases: Allowed', 'Diplomats Welcome', 'Shares Allowed', 'Walls Allowed', 'Minimum Term: 12 months', 'BUILDING PET POLICY', 'Pets Allowed.']
